name: The Art of Shibori - An Introduction to Japanese Tie Dye
description:
An ancient Japanese textile art form, Shibori embodies both craftsmanship and
creative expression. Rooted in centuries of tradition, Shibori is more than
just a technique; it is a philosophy that embraces the beauty of imperfection
and the harmony between nature and human touch. This makes each outcome raw
and different from one another.

This experience is an appreciation of the art of slowing down, of modern-day
sensibilities still being relevant through age-old techniques, and of finding
beauty and inspiration in all things that surround us.

_**The experience includes trying your hand at 3 different Shibori techniques
to create your own customised design on a piece of fabric, under the guidance
of an expert.**_

name: The Craft of Mixology - Making & Mastering A Fine Cocktail
description:
Discover the world of cocktails and spirits and learn how to balance your own
cocktail concoction under the guidance of expert mixologists.

The experience will include a quick introduction to different spirits,
cocktail making techniques, bar equipment, interesting garnishing tips along
with various stories and myths around cocktails and spirits.

name: Echoes of Calm - An Immersive Sound Bath Experience
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient
cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other
instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were
often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.

This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the
power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual
growth.

name: Oasis Of Scents - Artisanal Perfume Making
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Layers of Decadence - A Tiramisu Making Experience
description:
Tiramisu, meaning "pick me up" in Italian, was crafted to be as uplifting as
its name suggests. Some myths trace it back to the 17th century, when a
similar dessert called Duke’s Soup was made for Grand Duke Cosimo III de’
Medici, but the tiramisu we know today took shape much later.

Originally more of a custard than a cake, tiramisu evolved into its signature
layered form, with espresso-soaked biscuits and creamy mascarpone. Over the
years, it has become a global favourite, loved for its rich yet airy texture
and simple, no-bake process.

_**Join our Tiramisu Making Experience and master the art of crafting this
classic Italian dessert from scratch. Learn key techniques, from achieving the
perfect mascarpone texture to balancing flavors, and assemble your tiramisu
step by step. Take home your handcrafted treat to enjoy and share.**_  

_**Note: The experience includes egg/eggless options.**_

name: Glass Gardens - A Terrarium Making Experience
description:
Imagine our world, shrunk to fit inside a bottle. In 19th century England, a
chance encounter with a tenacious fern sparked an idea, that of a terrarium.
Today, these self-sustaining havens encapsulate a tiny piece of the great
outdoors, indoors, and are a testament to human ingenuity and nature's
resilience.

_**This immersive experience delves into the world of terrariums and plant
care. Participants get to make and take home their own terrarium.**_

_**Note: Participants will create a closed Terrarium in a Jar with tropical
plants.**_
